part.title: Listen and take notice of the differences
part.para: Note the differences between the following rhythmic patterns and how they are formed when we tie notes in the basic four 8th notes pattern. Compare this pattern with the one in the last measure. Note the different rhythmic accent between measures 3 and 4.
